name: Noodlemaker
description:
You play as an old Noodlemaker. The fact that the art of making noodles was corrupted by changing noodle-masters to heartless robots puts him in great frustration. His destiny is to survive with any costs in this world of automatised gastronomy. His enemies are fast and know no rest, but there is no soul in their noodle.

To make the noodle art great again, Old Noodlemaker is ready for any deception.
